name: DuckStep (Mr Afroduck, Curdle Games, Phibian)
description:
A game by CurdleGames, Mr_Afroduck & Phibian! Made for CurdleJam#29 themed "Played Like a Fiddle".

Do you have what it takes to keep up on the dance floor in this fast-paced rhythm game against 3 bosses?

Or will you refuse to be played like a fiddle and take a different approach?

Main Controls:
Arrows + Space (Match the rhythm sequence)

??? Controls:
You'll figure it out 😉
Tip: Use space or shift to roll!
